name: Meowstic
author: kirisAki
flavor_text: When in danger, it raises its ears and releases enough psychic power to grind a 10-ton truck into dust.

abilities.name: Mysterious Ears
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an opponent’s attack (even if this Pokémon is Knocked Out), the Attacking Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Psyblast
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to your opponent’s Active Pokémon.
